name: TGX
keywords: 2D graphics, 3D graphics, image, drawing primitives, real-time rendering, alpha-blending, anti-aliasing
description: TGX is a tiny but full featured C++ library for drawing 2D and 3D graphics onto a memory framebuffer. The library runs on any 32 bits CPU or MPU (ESP32, Teensy, RP2040...). It provides an extensive set of 2D/3D drawing primitives and aims at high quality rendering (anti-aliasing, alpha-blending, bilinear texture filtering...). The library itself is hardware-agnostic: an independent driver is required to display the image framebuffer onto a physical screen.
